topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade 2.1: Deploy the Standard Region using the HCG Dashboard UI (Denver Deployment)

body.p: After the lifecycle manager VM is installed, the next task in installing the HP Helion OpenStack cloud. Follow the steps in this section to use the HCG Dashboard UI to perform the required tasks. Or, you can use the HLM CLI to perform these tasks.

The HCG Dashboard UI is a cloud management tool that allows users to define, deploy, manage, and monitor a HP Helion OpenStack cloud. The tool helps you provide and validate the cloud definitions required to deploy your cloud and guide you through the deployment.
